resources.string: In order to use the application, you must grant the coarse location permission.
In order to use the application, you must grant the coarse location permission.\n\nYou have to change it manually through the settings application.
Location permission was revoked. In order to use the application, you must grant the location permission manually through the settings application.
Server error happened. Check your network connection and try again or return a bit later.
Error happened while fetching your current location. Check your location settings and try again.
It seems like you have no internet connection. Check network settings and try again.
Unexpected error happened. You can try it again or return a bit later.
